mapper.insert: insert into shop ( username, password, shop_name, shop_address, shop_email, shop_phone, shop_status, pay_detail_id, create_time ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{shopName}, #{shopAddress}, #{shopEmail}, #{shopPhone}, #{shopStatus}, #{payDetailId}, #{createTime} )
